Text: @bob9001a Not supposed to be a film idiot.
@craddle - Yet it's posted in the Highres 'Movies' section. But since you're confident enough to call out the 'idiots,' I'm sure you noticed this and all. Otherwise, that would be idiotic.

I don't know about the rest of you, but I download tv shows and movies after I input the show name, season, and episode into the search bar.  I do not browse, so I couldn't care less WHERE the torrent is posted, so long as it is posted and I can download.
@23SHow33im - Never start an argument with an idiot. They will drag you down to their level and beat you with experience:)
